====Ancient Engravings====
Located on the upper northeast side of the Hortus Euergetis [[Teleport Waypoint]], at the base of the rock arch. 

{{Readable|title=Ancient Engravings|May your melody find peace, kindhearted [[Euergetia]], my colleague, my friend, my sister.<br><!--
-->Though your beneficence be forgotten, though your name be forgotten, here the flowers shall always bloom for you.<br><!--
-->Sleep, sleep, worry no more for the past, weep no more for the future, and laugh as you once did.<br><!--
-->—[[Cassiodor|Ouranides of Ouranopolis]]}}<!--
